item.title: Trump’s Tactics Mean Many International Students Won’t Make It to Campus

item.title: Senate Adds Guardrails in an Effort to Force Trump to Obey Spending Bills

item.title: Judge Halts Texas Law Mandating the Ten Commandments in School
item.description: The state law had said public schools would have to display the Ten Commandments in a “conspicuous” location in every classroom in Texas by Sept. 1.

item.title: Russia Demands Role in Guaranteeing Ukraine’s Postwar Security
item.description: European and Ukrainian officials call the idea ludicrous, showing the large gaps in peace negotiations.
